resources.string:
Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Samsung Internet Browser, Via Browser, XBrowser, Magic Browser, VC Browser, Salfish Browser (by Ruanmei.com), Lim Browser, H5 Browser, Opera Browser, DU Browser, 360 Browser, Sogou Browser, YuBrowser, Maxthon Browser etc.

Unsupported (Both Chinese app markets and Play Store editions):
UC Browser, Firefox Browser, QQ Browser, Quark Browser etc.
Please set date and time for your timetable

Features:
1. Parse the school timetable from school's education system website, only some of the ZFSoft education system are supported
2. Generate iCalendar file (.ics) from school timetable, which can be imported into Google Calendar and so forth
3. Week Indicator, to create all-day events on Monday that tells which week it is

Note:
1. Make sure to set your date and time before exporting the timetable to calendar
2. Repeat the process if your school timetable on school's education system website gets update, alternatively the update can be applied by manual modifications within the app
3. You have to undo the previous calendar import before exporting the updated one

To parse school timetable:
1.Go find your school timetable on school's official ZFSoft education system website via supported browser
2.Long-press on any item in your school timetable so as to enter text-selecting mode, then press "select all" and then "copy", the content is now copied to clipboard
3.Come back and hit "parse from clipboard"
School timetable be exported to Google Calendar
No school timetable information for the time being
More information is needed\nPlease enter start week and end week below:
In the section above, set the default break duration in all phases through a day, while each of the settings below will override the default of the corresponding phase.
Shift to supported browsers then try again
App mode (do not specify time zone information)
Since this feature is no longer maintained, we suggest that you look for other alternatives
The HTML file generated from the original school timetable code in clipboard
